function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible overconsumption of energy by the IoT devices leading to increased operational costs.","Impact":"Higher operational costs and potential environmental impact due to excessive energy usage.","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient hardware and optimize software for reduced energy consumption.","Technologies":"Energy-efficient hardware, power management techniques, and software optimization.","People":"Building owners, facility managers, and IoT device manufacturers.","Owner":"Facility managers, IoT device manufacturers, and software developers."},{"Description":"Inefficient use of battery capacity due to inaccurate dimensioning based on energy consumption data.","Impact":"Risk of downtime and disrupted operations if battery capacity is inadequate for the actual energy consumption.","Mitigation":"Accurately dimension batteries based on energy consumption data and consider fluctuations in energy usage.","Technologies":"Battery management systems, accurate energy consumption monitoring tools.","People":"Building owners, facility managers, and IoT device engineers.","Owner":"IoT device engineers and facility managers."},{"Description":"Lack of awareness about the sustainability impact of the deployed IoT system among students and staff.","Impact":"Missed opportunity to educate and involve students and staff in sustainability efforts, leading to disengagement with environmental issues.","Mitigation":"Conduct educational initiatives to raise awareness about sustainability and the environmental impact of IoT systems.","Technologies":"Education and awareness campaigns, IoT sustainability metrics.","People":"Students, staff, and facility managers.","Owner":"Education administrators and facility managers."}]}
